title: Balanced K-Means for Clustering
venue: International Workshop on Structural and Syntactic Pattern Recognition

tldr.text: A k-means-based clustering algorithm, which optimizes mean square error, for given cluster sizes, and makes the assignment phase time complexity On 3 faster, which enables clustering of bigger datasets of size over 5000 points.
